articles.title: Coronavirus heat maps reveal which Queensland regions have more cases, with young women the largest demographic - msnNOW
articles.description: The Queensland Government releases a forensic dataset showing the skew of COVID-19 cases in young women and heat maps showing a greater concentration of cases in the South East and Cairns.
